name: Winfoware Technologies Limited
overview:
We offer best value IT solutions using emerging technologies.

Areas of expertise spans Cloud computing and monitoring , COntent Management , mobility and social , communication and wireless , media and infotainment , defense, embedded and security.

Combined with a Delivery governance framework based on certified quality frameworks, software engineering practices and offshore delivery model, Winfoware is an ideal technology Partner to mid and large businesses looking to differentiate through IT platforms.
